oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Connie Smith - 2011-09-12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Third of three Artist in Residence appearances. Performance by Connie Smith and others in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 12, 2011. Special guests include Jean Shepard; the Quebe Sisters; Tanya Tucker; Martina McBride; Band includes Rick Wright; Gary Carter; Mark Casstevens; Ric McClure; Paul Martin; Ron Ham;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Connie Smith; Jean Shepard; Tanya Tucker; Martina McBride; the Quebe Sisters;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performances include; Ain't Had No Lovin'; What's A Heart Like You; Ain't You Even Gonna Cry; The Keys In The Mailbox; I Thought Of You; Slippin' Away (Jean Shepard); Jesse Polka (the Quebe Sisters); If I Talk To Him (the Quebe Sisters); My Heart Has A Mind Of Its Own; Burning A Hole In My Mind; Delta Dawn excerpt (Tanya Tucker); I Never Once Stopped Loving You (Tanya Tucker); Changes (Tanya Tucker); Anymore; Where I Used To Have A Heart (Martina McBride); Once A Day (with Martina McBride); It Wasn't God Who Made Honky Tonk Angels (with Jean Shepard, Tanya Tucker, Martina McBride); Take My Hand; Satisfied;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Smith, Connie, 1941-; Shepard, Jean, 1933-; Tucker, Tanya; McBride, Martina; Quebe Sisters Band; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
